name: Elderflower Fizz

ingredients.name: lime sour (two parts organic lime juice, one part organic agave nectar)

preparation:
Relax with this bubbly drink from Scottsdale, Ariz.'s Camelback Inn Resort & Spa.

Add all the ingredients except the sparkling wine to a Champagne flute.

Top with sparkling wine.

Slap a thyme sprig once between your palms to release its oils.

Use it to stir the drink and leave it in as a garnish.
